title: Train services running slower due to speed restrictions

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于限速，火车服务运行较慢
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api berjalan lebih perlahan kerana sekatan kelajuan
title_translations.ta: வேகக் கட்டுப்பாடுகள் காரணமாக ரயில் சேவைகள் மெதுவாக இயங்குகின்றன

updates.text: SVC UPDATE: North-bound train service is now running smoothly. Have a good evening.
Train service from Bishan to Jurong is running slower this evening.
Train services are running slower this morning due to speed restrictions.
